ЁЯСС
Rule and Administration

Original Name: Jalal Khan (son of Sher Shah).
He continued his father's administrative policies and further centralized the state. He took strict measures to reduce the power of the nobility.

ЁЯУЬ
Reforms

Islam Shah codified laws. He organized the army into decimal units (units of 50, 200, 250, 500 soldiers) as a precursor to the Mansabdari system. He built additional inns between the ones constructed by his father.

тЪ░я╕П
End

After his death (1554), chaos spread within the Suri empire, paving the way for Humayun's return.
